Install necessary packages.

```{r}
install.packages("readr")
install.packages("data.table")

# In case we use neural networks (we probably will). Not including because the
#  library is quite large.
# install.packages("keras") 
# install_keras()

```

Import necessary libraries.

```{r}

library(readr)
library(data.table)
# library(keras)


```

Then, we can import the data.

```{r}
onlineShopperData <- read.csv("data/online_shoppers_intention.csv")
```


Data is easier to manipulate in the data.table library, so we'll convert it to a Data Table.

```{r}
setDT(onlineShopperData)
```
